channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The ‘Ghosts of 2007’ and the graybeard ‘Nifty 50’: BofA looks at the rare situation in markets and finds ominous parallels to the GFC and the dotcom bubble

item.title: OpenAI’s GPT-5 Launch Causes Backlash Due to Colder Responses
item.description: When OpenAI released a new version of ChatGPT, people were quick to protest its colder responses. Acknowledging the emotional attachment with chatbots...

item.title: Exclusive: MAHA is reshaping Amazon’s Whole Foods and other consumer packaged goods companies’ supply chains more than tariffs right now, manufacturing platform CEO says
item.description: Keychain, a manufacturing platform, has seen an uptick in “natural” projects from its customers as food retailers respond to the healthy eating push.

item.title: Walmart recalls potentially radioactive frozen shrimp sold in 13 states
item.description: Federal officials detected Cesium-137, a radioactive isotope, in shipping containers and a sample of breaded shrimp imported from Indonesia.

item.title: Triangles are stamped all over Nvidia’s $920 million headquarters, and there’s a symbolic reason why
item.description: Triangles, for Nvidia, represent both a nod to history, but also a crucial lesson learned.

item.title: Elon Musk’s teen prodigy Kairan Quazi is ditching SpaceX for billionaire Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities
item.description: Quazi has defied every expectation since he was 10. Now the teen prodigy is defying the allure of Silicon Valley.

item.title: ICE Wrongly Suggests Lawmaker Doxxed Agents, and Racist Threats Follow

item.title: Manhunt Underway After Texas Jail Mistakenly Releases Inmate
item.description: The release of a man who had been serving a five-year sentence for assault is the second time the jail has released someone prematurely this year.

item.title: Trump Says He’s Ended 6 (or 7) Wars. Here’s Some Context.
item.description: President Trump has cast himself as a global peacemaker. His interventions have calmed some conflicts, while in others his role is less clear.
